title: Dragon Daddy Diaries: A Girl Grows To Greatness
alternative_title: Parenting Diary of the Strongest Dragon Who Suddenly Became a Dad ~Cute Daughter, Heartwarming and Growing up to Be the Strongest in the Human World~ ; 突然パパになった最強ドラゴンの子育て日記 ～かわいい娘、ほのぼのと人間界最強に育つ～ ; Дневник сильнейшего дракона, который стал отцом милой лоли ; Totsuzen Papa ni Natta Saikyou Dragon no Kosodate Nikki: Kawaii Musume, Honobono to Ningenkai Saikyou ni Sodatsu
status: Parenting Diary of the Strongest Dragon Who Suddenly Became a Dad ~Cute Daughter, Heartwarming and Growing up to Be the Strongest in the Human World~ ; 突然パパになった最強ドラゴンの子育て日記 ～かわいい娘、ほのぼのと人間界最強に育つ～ ; Дневник сильнейшего дракона, который стал отцом милой лоли ; Totsuzen Papa ni Natta Saikyou Dragon no Kosodate Nikki: Kawaii Musume, Honobono to Ningenkai Saikyou ni Sodatsu
description:
Description :
        “Daddy!” The dragon blinked as the wee little human called out to him. Him? Her “Daddy”? Powerful enough to have been venerated by humankind, yet warmhearted and even a tad ditzy, the dragon soon finds himself raising and doting on the precocious Olivia as if she really were his daughter in this touching tale. The toddler may be impossibly cute now, but just you wait—she’s a curious child and she’s growing up real fast. You can bet that one day, she’ll be the strongest human there is! But first, how will he handle little Olivia receiving an acceptance letter to a human school? Web Novel: https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5327ft/
